summary: THE AIR CONDITIONER WENT OUT ON MY SUBURBAN IN EARLY JUNE.  I AM STILL WAITING FOR THE PART THAT IS ON BACK ORDER.  IT GETS VERY HOT IN THE SUMMER IN MY STATE AND IS CONCERNING TO ME AND MY CHILDREN.  WHEN WE ARE STOPPED IN TRAFFIC IT IS HORRIBLE.  WE CAN'T TAKE OUR DOGS WITH US BECAUSE IT IS TOO HOT FOR THEM.
